Question: In Los Angeles, Pang encouraged this person to develop regular contact with Julian, whom he had not seen for two years.
Hints: Although the exhibition had not yet begun, this person wanted to hammer a nail into the clean board, but Ono stopped him.
Questioned about it later, this person said, "Well, it was almost a love affair, but not quite.
This person changed his name by deed poll on 22 April 1969, adding "Ono" as a middle name.
